item.title: Small tiny rats creeps out from the underground near the marble arch tube station and old quebec street., 22nd September
item.description:
There are pubs, cafe and restaurants who have outdoor seating arrangements and these tiny creatures are sighted on the street during the evenings making the customers uncomfortable and unsafe.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-2, Albion Street, Knightsbridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gutters and pavements in Shortlands road., 22nd September
item.description:
From Shortlands library travelling towards Shortlands station, the pavements and drains are filled with leaves, pine needles and detritus on BOTH sides of the road and desperately need urgent cleansing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waldron Gardens, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven/ damaged pavement, 22nd September
item.description:
